definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: There were armoured personnel carriers and tanks on the streets…
sentences.chinese: 街上有装甲运兵车和坦克。

sentences.english: I am Alpha and omega. the beginning and the end. the first and the last.
sentences.chinese: 这个小说的开头让我想起了异度装甲。

sentences.english: The communication between the panzer and commanding car is realized by the wireless data transmission module.
sentences.chinese: 装甲车辆与指挥车之间的通信通过无线数传模块实现。

sentences.english: Can be shipped armored vehicles we have for "sale" all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们的装甲车可以转让可运世界各地。

sentences.english: The helicopter can carry up to eight missiles under the stub wings for anti-armour role.
sentences.chinese: 直升飞机能为反装甲任务在短翼下携带八枚导弹。

sentences.english: And I found a armored car on crossing of GuCui Road.
sentences.chinese: 后来我又发现一辆装甲车在古翠路的路口。

sentences.english: Armor of any kind, including APCs, Russia.
sentences.chinese: 从俄罗斯购买装甲，包括有穿甲弹头的。

sentences.english: In the choice to dissolve the armoring, the capacity to love again can be restored.
sentences.chinese: 在选择溶解装甲中，爱的能力能再次被恢复。

sentences.english: Scattering the Chinese provokers with armoured vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 用装甲车驱散中国的挑衅者。

sentences.english: They will all provide the same debuff at 12% armor reduction.
sentences.chinese: 他们都将提供相同的减益效果的装甲减少12%。

sentences.english: Britain´s first seagoing ironclad warship, HMS Warrior, was launched.
sentences.chinese: 英国第一艘远洋装甲战艇“勇士号”下水。

sentences.english: Typically, defense contractors crank out just a few hundred armored vehicles a year.
sentences.chinese: 通常，国防承包商一年才造几百辆装甲车。

sentences.english: Panzer Elite Infantry Halftrack health reduced from 300 to 285.
sentences.chinese: 装甲精英步兵半履带车生命由300降低至285。

sentences.english: Later Xu Ning destroyed Huyan Zhou's armored cavalry with his barbed lances.
sentences.chinese: 后来许呢嗯摧毁呼延周与他的长矛刺装甲骑兵。

sentences.english: The Chopper VX is a very lightly armored Transformer.
sentences.chinese: VX机甲是非常轻装甲的变形体。

sentences.english: The panzers then swung into action, launching an outflanking attack to the south of the town.
sentences.chinese: 装甲部队开始参战，从城市的南面进行迂回攻击。

definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)/(literary) shoes and belt
